definitions.definition: The process or state of growing worse , or the state of having become worse.
That condition of a tissue or an organ in which its vitality has become either diminished or perverted ; a substitution of a lower for a higher form of structure.
Gradual deterioration, from natural causes, of any class of animals or plants or any particular organ or organs; hereditary degradation of type.

main_definition: ( uncountable , countable ) The process or state of growing worse , or the state of having become worse.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) That condition of a tissue or an organ in which its vitality has become either diminished or perverted ; a substitution of a lower for a higher form of structure.
( uncountable ) Gradual deterioration, from natural causes, of any class of animals or plants or any particular organ or organs; hereditary degradation of type.
( countable ) A thing that has degenerated.
